award_title: CAREER: Temporal Learning Towards Trustworthy Decision for Healthcare
subject: Your students' temporal ML work
body:
Hi Xiaolei,

I saw your CAREER award on temporal learning for healthcare ML. As you're training the next generation in this space, I thought Ouro might be useful for your group.

I'm building Ouro, a place to publish your computational workflows as APIs with a Python SDK so other researchers can call your methods directly. Your work becomes infrastructure others build on, not just a paper they cite.

For grad students and postdocs, having their tools used by other labs is a real career assetâ€”builds their reputation before the job market.

Let me know if you'd like to take it for a spin.

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
